book_overrides.description: Override specific book data before data preparation. Use this to fix books that were re-read in 2025 but Goodreads doesn't export the correct dates.
book_overrides.usage: Edit this file to add books you've read multiple times - especially re-reads in the current year where dates are missing or incorrect.

overrides.title: Mockingjay
overrides.author: Suzanne Collins
overrides.note: Previously read in 2024, re-read in March 2025

overrides.title: Catching Fire
overrides.author: Suzanne Collins
overrides.note: Previously read in 2024, re-read in March 2025

overrides.title: The Hunger Games
overrides.author: Suzanne Collins
overrides.note: Previously read in 2024, re-read in March 2025

overrides.title: Iron Flame
overrides.author: Rebecca Yarros
overrides.note: Previously read in 2024, re-read in January 2025

fields_prompt.Date Read: Use format 'YYYY/MM/DD' for the completion date in current year.
fields_prompt.Exclusive Shelf: Set to 'read' for completed books, 'currently-reading' for in progress.
fields_prompt.Read Count: Number of times finishing the book. Set higher for re-reads.
